Translations.Text: Udayen akked imasieiyen, nnan: "nekwni d tarwa n Oebbi, d wid Ismenyaf". Ini: "acimi, ihi, ikwen Ipaaqab $ef ibekkaven nnwen? Xaii, kunwi d imexlaq am wiyav". Ad Isemmee i win i S ihwan, ad Iaaqeb win i S ihwan. N Oebbi tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Taggara $uoeS

A yAt Tezmamt! Ni$ iusa kwen id Umazan nneÂ£, ad awen ibeggen, mi taadda tallit war imazanen. Akka ur d teqqaoem ara: "ur a$ d iusi ubeccao, ne$ uneddao". Ihi, iusa kwen id ubeccao, uneddao. Oebbi Izmer i yal cci
Mi inna Musa i ugdud is: "a yagdud iw! Mmektit ed l$it ikwen I$at Oebbi. Irra segwen lambiyya, Irra kwen d igeldan. Ifka yawen ayen ur Ifki i yiwen, deg imavalen
A yagdud iw! Kecmet akal ioqan, i wen Iura Oebbi. Ur d ppu$alet $er deffir wen, a d tegwrim txesoem
Nnan: "a Musa! Degs agdud iaafriten, nekwni ur p nkeccem, d awez$i, alamma ff$en d segs. Mi d ff$en segs, a nekcem
Sin irgazen, seg wid iugaden - Isaad iten Oebbi -, nnan: "kecmet $uosen si tebburt; ma tkecmem, kunwi, ih, a prebeem. Ppeklet af Oebbi, ma d lmumnin ay tellam
